sourcesContent:
import './Hotel.css' import NavigationBar from "../Components/NavigationBar/NavigationBar" import Header from "../Components/Header/Header" import MailList from "../Components/EmailList/MailList" import Footer from "../Components/Footer/Footer" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { useState } from 'react' import { faCircleLeft, faCircleRight, faXmarkCircle } from '@fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons' import { faLocationDot } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import useFetch from "../../hook/useFetch.js" import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' const Hotel = () => { const location = useLocation() const id = location.split("/") const [SliderNumber, setSliderNumber] = useState(0); const [Open, setOpen] = useState(false); const {data,loading,error} = useFetch(`/hotels/${id}`) const handleOpen = (i) =>{ setSliderNumber(i); setOpen(true); } const handleMove = (direction) => { let newSlideNumber; if (direction==="s"){ newSlideNumber = SliderNumber === 0 ? 5 : SliderNumber-1 } else { newSlideNumber = SliderNumber === 5 ? 0 : SliderNumber+1 } setSliderNumber(newSlideNumber) } return (
{loading ? ( "Se incarca" ) : (
{Open &&
setOpen(false)}/> handleMove("s")}/>
handleMove("d")}/>
}

{data.nume}

{data.adresa}
Distanta buna - {data.distanta}m de centru Rezerva un sejur de peste {data.cmipret} RON la aceasta proprietate si obtine un discount la urmatorul sejur.
{data.imagini.map((photo,i) => (
handleOpen(i)} src={photo.src} alt="" className="HotelImage" />
))}

{data.titlu}

{data.descriere}

Perfect pentru o noapte!

Localizat aproape de centrul orasului, acest hotel are un scor al locatiei de 4.9!

199 RON (o noapte)

)}
) } export default Hotel
